diagnosis.final_diagnosis: left hip septic joint post femoral head resection
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient exhibited severe left hip pain and a history of significant medical issues including intravenous substance abuse, endocarditis, and septic joint requiring surgery. The evaluation included X-rays which confirmed the missing left femoral head, and her negative urine drug screen indicated no current illicit drug use, supporting the decision to prescribe a short course of opioids for pain management.
